description.narrative: Cross-Sectoral Support to programme implementation., which contributes to Communication And Advocacy, Cross-Sectoral - Human Rights, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Private Sector Engagement, Supply And Logistics. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Harnessing Power Of Business And Markets, Innovation, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Partnerships And Engagement: Public And Private, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2025, the programme of cooperation is designed, coordinated, managed and supported effectively to generate the expected results for children in accordance with quality norms and standards.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: The CO ensured the mainstreaming of business for results (B4R) and innovations to achieve results for children at scale. In 2021 public/private engagement contributed to the mobilization of financial resources and in-kind donations to support programme implementation. The CO expanded its use of RapidPro for routine programmes as well as emergencies, mainly for promoting COVID-19 prevention measures and vaccination uptake and to prevent Ebola, thereby providing more than 3 million U-Reporters with access to life-saving information. ; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:28/01/2022
